fixes.name: Filter
fixes.dax_expression: 'Data (Complaint Line)'[Category] = SELECTEDVALUE('Selected Product'[Display As]) && 'Data (Complaint Line)'[Type] = SELECTEDVALUE('Date Type'[Display As])
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau parameter references to SELECTEDVALUE('ParameterName'[Display As]) for both [Parameters].[Selected Product] and [Parameters].[Date Type]. Transformed Tableau logical AND to DAX && and converted row field references to 'Data (Complaint Line)'[Category] and 'Data (Complaint Line)'[Type]. The expression returns a boolean comparing row values to the selected parameter values.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation references Tableau parameters (Selected Product and Date Type). Per rules, any formula that references parameters must be implemented as a measure.
